Toad_Scorns_Ducks: ^So, THIS is the Ducks' new Delivery Pig.
^/Toad clears his throat and the gang falls silent./
^They think it's easy to make cake. They think it's fun to run a neighborhood.
^We're not afraid of them. They're going to fail anyway.
^Parts of the cake-making are difficult beyond imagination.
^You're just a tiny, confused, insignificant part of the bigger picture.

defending_neighborhood: ^Bullies? The rest of the city, they're the real bullies. Did you know? This neighborhood is the last largest haven in the WORLD.
^You think this cake is just cake? Cake is what we send on holidays. Cake brings us together.
^Others have tried to disrupt the cake before. They failed.
not_afraid_of_ducks: ^Take our message back to the ducks.
^Bzz. (We don't want to keep dealing with startups! You'll be our example.)
^/Crab snips his claws./ We won't enjoy it THAT much, we swear!
^I'm not sorry. There's too much at stake.
